org.spongepowered.api.network

Interface ChannelBinding.IndexedMessageChannel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelBinding
    Enclosing interface:
    ChannelBinding

    public static interface ChannelBinding.IndexedMessageChannel
extends ChannelBinding
    Represents a channel binding that sends and receives messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerMessage

        void registerMessage(Class<? extends Message> messageClass,
                     int messageId)
        Register a message class to this channel without a receiving handler. This will only allow the message to be sent, this channel binding will not be able to receive the message.

        The message ID is used to identify this message class as it is sent and received across the network, it is a single byte and thus has a range of 0 to 255.

        Parameters:
        messageClass - The class of the message being registered. Note: the class must have a publicly accessible no-args constructor
        messageId - A unique ID for this message

      • registerMessage

        <M extends Message> void registerMessage(Class<M> messageClass,
                                         int messageId,
                                         MessageHandler<M> handler)
        Register a message class to this channel and a handler for receiving the message. The handler is invoked every time the message is sent to either side.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - The class of the message being registered
        messageId - A unique ID for this message
        handler - The handler that acts upon the message being received

      • registerMessage

        <M extends Message> void registerMessage(Class<M> messageClass,
                                         int messageId,
                                         Platform.Type side,
                                         MessageHandler<M> handler)
        Register a message class to this channel and a handler for receiving the message. The handler is invoked every time the message is sent to the given side.
        Parameters:
        messageClass - The class of the message being registered
        messageId - A unique ID for this message
        side - The side to listen to messages on
        handler - The handler that acts upon the message being received

      • addHandler

        <M extends Message> void addHandler(Class<M> messageClass,
                                    Platform.Type side,
                                    MessageHandler<M> handler)
        Register a MessageHandler for a Message.
        Type Parameters:
        M - The type of message
        Parameters:
        messageClass - The class to handle
        side - The side being handled
        handler - The handler

        <M extends Message> void addHandler(Class<M> messageClass,

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        handler - The handler

      • sendTo

        void sendTo(Player player,
            Message message)
        Sends the message to the player across this channel. The message may not be sent if the player doesn't have a registered handler.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send the message to
        message - The message to send

      • sendToServer

        void sendToServer(Message message)
        Sends the message to the server. The message may not be sent if there is no registered handler. This must be called from the client side.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send

      • sendToAll

        void sendToAll(Message message)
        Sends the message to all players on the server.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send
